Title: Relates to recordkeeping requirements for second-hand dealers and pawnbrokers
Summary: Provides for electronic recordkeeping requirements for second-hand dealers and pawnbrokers.
LawCode: Amd §§41, 43, 45 & 47, add Art 5-B §§57 - 57-c, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to recordkeeping requirements for second-hand dealers and pawnbrokers
